IC.DESCRIPTION: Made from fresh cow's milk to give the smoothest texture and long lasting taste!
Made from selected strawberries from Himachal Pradesh!
Pista flavoured kulfi is our highest selling and all time favourite kulfi!
Roasted almonds gives an unique taste which can be found no where else
Pan lover? The pan flavoured kulfi is a perfect blend of sweet and spice!
A rarely made black raspberry ice cream with mouth watering chocolate covered almonds

Sweet candy covered pecans mixed with electrifying Caramel swirls
